physical_appearance: This is a set of paper patterns. There are five pieces of paper being displayed. Two of them have the same shapes as one another, while the other three are of different shapes and sizes. There are numerous vertical lines on all of the paper patterns. They are spaced out evenly in each paper pattern. These paper patterns are all of the same shade of brown.
sgcool_label_text: This is a set of paper pattern of a housecoat which was possibly made by a local tailor. Paper patterns were commonly produced by tailors as part of the process of tailoring custom-made clothing for customers.
